did.unittitle: Phillips P. Moulton Woolman research papers

bioghist.p: Phillips P. Moulton (b. 1909) was a Quaker scholar who edited The Journal and Major Essays of John Woolman, published by Oxford University Press in 1971 as an edition of its Library of Protestant Thought. He was a professor at Adrian College.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of Moulton's note cards, correspondence (primarily with Henry J. Cadbury), photocopies, and other papers related to the editing of John Woolman's writings. The collection also contains microfilm of Mss A & B of Woolman's Journal from the Historical Society of Pennsylvania.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Friends Historical Library, Swarthmore College: Woolman research papers.
